quotes.quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
If a man neglects education, he walks lame to the end of his life.
The lame man who keeps the right road outstrips the runner who takes the wrong one.
You may help a lame dog over a stile but he is still a lame dog on the other side.
It's lame when you try so hard to get what you want, and then when you get it, you realize you need something else even harder to get.
Faith becomes lame, when it ventures into matters pertaining to reason!
Only feeble minds are paralyzed by facts.
If the body be feeble, the mind will not be strong.
A man of feeble character resembles a reed that bends with every gust of wind.
It's lame to say that I'm a normal girl, but I think I am.
When you can impress your mom by saying you've been to someone's concert, you know you're pretty lame.
It is a true proverb, that if you live with a lame man, you will learn to limp.
When people are lame, they love to blame.
How come all the harmless people were so lame? Maybe that was the definition of safe.
Punishment is lame, but it comes.
The feeble soul merely whines and complains.
Quotations are feeble; you always regret making them.
A feeble executive implies a feeble execution of the government.
If you're a lame brain, then you're a lame brain. I can't help that.
I'm sort of like a lame, single guy in a red sports car.
This sounds really lame, but I'm pretty proud of my feet.
